title: Senior Designer, Menswear
content:
OVERVIEW:
Embark on a thrilling journey with Gymshark as a Senior Menswear Designer! Are you a design maestro with a flair for fitness fashion? We're on the lookout for a dynamic leader to spearhead our design team.
Your role will involve managing and mentoring a talented group of designers, delivering cutting-edge designs within tight deadlines, and maintaining Gymshark's unique aesthetic. Dive into trend research, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and present your visionary designs to senior leadership. If you're armed with a design or textiles education, possess a killer portfolio, and excel in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator, we want you! 
Join Gymshark and be the driving force behind our next iconic menswear collections. Elevate your career in a high-energy, innovative environment where your creativity takes centre stage. Shape the future of fitness fashion ‚Äì apply now!
WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING:

Managing and training designers, junior designers, or graduates.
Delivery of inline designs under leadership of the Heads of Design within agile deadlines. Either by designing yourself or working with the design team to manage the process and output in consideration of quality, cost, and aesthetic needs.
Responsible for both creation of the styles as well as maintaining the information of the evolution of those styles throughout all products.
Research and maintain knowledge of relevant fashion and sportswear trends.
Research themes, colours, trends and fabrics for Mens inline product.
Work closely with the Womenswear and Menswear Head of Design to maintain a cohesive Gymshark DNA.
Strong understanding of fit and executing fit intent with your technical (product development) partners and ability to clearly communicate and drive fit intent with your technical / development partners. 
Mentor and train the design team that you lead to ensure they are creating consistent and cohesive collections/styles and providing them technical guidance.
Responsible for delivering work in adherence to deadlines, being solutions oriented to solve operational challenges. To be agile in high pressure working environments.
Partner with relevant designers to ensure that the creative direction is captured at a style level.
Curating, maintaining, and approving lab dips for the seasonal colour palettes.
Understanding and motivated to explore and research athlete/fitness needs and the male/female form in order to communicate design and fit intent with your development partners.
Accurately creating and communicating industry standard design specifications to cross-functional teams.
Understanding & researching key trends that align to Gymshark‚Äôs key consumers.
Choosing fit for purpose materials and trims for commercial products.
Confidently presenting season designs to Gymshark senior leadership.

WHAT YOU'LL NEED:Essential Skills:

Education in Design or Textiles (BA, BFA, BS) or similar.
An in-depth understanding of materials, colour, construction, style, trend, design, marketplace and consumer knowledge.
Ability to adapt to changing market landscape and to pivot and be flexible within the work space as needed.
Proven track record working in a team and collaborating with others to deliver product.
Strong proficiency in in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Excel, and Microsoft Office.
Have an outstanding portfolio demonstrating a versatile handwriting with experience working on several types of apparel products.
Experience working in a design-led environment and working with Product teams.
Strong ability to story tell creative ideas and designs.
Strong communication skills within a team and cross-functionally.
Able to present work to an audience of key stakeholders and senior leadership.
Strong communication skills, verbal and written.

This is a hybrid role and would require the successful candidate to attend at least 3 days a week in GSHQ, Solihull, UK.
CLOSING DATE: 27th November 2023
BELONGING AT GYMSHARK.
Our mission is to be a place where everyone belongs. We‚Äôre an equal opportunities employer, and for us that means we always strive to be as inclusive as possible in all aspects of employment, right from your application. We‚Äôre committed to finding reasonable adjustments* for candidates with specific needs or have a disability during our recruitment process, and all applicants will be considered fairly and equally. We do not tolerate discrimination of any kind. *If you‚Äôd like to request a reasonable adjustment please email talent@gymshark.com. 
ABOUT US.
We‚Äôre here to unite the conditioning community. We believe that putting the sweat in today, prepares us for tomorrow. So, we give people the tools they need to reach further, go faster, be stronger. We celebrate those who show up ‚Äì for themselves ‚Äì to be their physical or mental best, whatever that means for them. It‚Äôs what we want for our community, and our team. A team that‚Äôs growing rapidly around the world. A collective of talented individuals working together to invent Gymshark‚Äôs future. Our plans are ambitious, and we‚Äôre looking for people who want to join us for the ride ‚Äì our growth will be your growth.
